name: MAYATCH
description:
Enjoy a relaxing and casual game, free from annoying ads or life systems that force you to pay and/or watch ads to continue playing!

-Take it anywhere you go! It's so lightweight that you'll always have space for this fun and relaxing game!

-Instant fun! Simply launch the game and play immediately.

-Stuck? Reset the board and watch as both the chips and frustrations fall away!

-Want a challenge? Select a challenge mode and try to get your score as high as possible!

-Want to relax? Play the casual mode and take a break from it all.
